editors_note.headline: Editor's Desk
editors_note.hook: The headline is Transformers.js v4 Preview: Now Available on NPM, but the real question is what it means for your vendor assumptions and Q2 plans.
editors_note.spotlight: Transformers.js v4 Preview: Now Available on NPM! — it's the most likely to change near-term decisions for teams shipping AI products.
editors_note.underhyped: A Small-Scale System for Autoregressive Program Synthesis Enabling Controlled Experimentation deserves more attention than it's getting.
editors_note.risk: Keep an eye on Here are the brands bringing ads to ChatGPT — it could shift budgets or vendor assumptions.

lead_story.title: Transformers.js v4 Preview: Now Available on NPM!
lead_story.what_happened: Transformers.js v4 Preview shipped this week, opening a new option for teams evaluating alternatives.
lead_story.our_take: Version bumps only matter if they reduce friction in your actual workflow — test before celebrating.
lead_story.what_to_do: Install Transformers.js v4 Preview, run it against one real task, and log latency and output quality.

sections.title: Open Source Watch

articles.title: antigravity-awesome-skills
articles.summary: The Ultimate Collection of 700+ Agentic Skills for Claude Code/Antigravity/Cursor. Currently at 8,459 stars with ~302 stars/day growth.
articles.what_happened: Antigravity-awesome-skills is picking up momentum in the open-source community.
articles.why_it_matters: Momentum behind antigravity-awesome-skills is real, but maintenance quality should gate adoption decisions.
articles.what_to_do: Pick two tools from the antigravity-awesome-skills list you haven't used and try one this week.
articles.our_take: Curated lists are great for discovery but terrible for decision-making. Pick one tool and actually ship with it.

articles.title: PaperBanana
articles.summary: PaperBanana: Automating Academic Illustration For AI Scientists. Currently at 3,325 stars with ~277 stars/day growth.
articles.what_happened: PaperBanana: Automating Academic Illustration For AI Scientists.
articles.why_it_matters: Momentum behind PaperBanana is real, but maintenance quality should gate adoption decisions.
articles.what_to_do: Review PaperBanana issue tracker, last commit date, and license before considering adoption.
articles.our_take: Star velocity tells you whats popular, not whats reliable. Check the issue backlog before the star count.

articles.summary: A Small-Scale System is a development worth monitoring for near-term product and tooling decisions (via arXiv CS.AI).

articles.our_take: Smaller and cheaper usually beats bigger and smarter for most production use cases. Watch this space.
